title: Intraday and positional Short term trading call
text:
-- Market Update --

Benchmark indices added to their opening gains in Friday's morning session to trade over half a percent higher, lifted by metal stocks. The S&P was trading 215 points, or 0.6 higher at 37,280 levels. YES Bank, Tata Steel, Vedanta, Tata Motors (NS: ), and ITC (NS: ) were the top gainers in the Sensex pack. The broader Nifty50 index was up 65 points, or 0.6 percent, to 11,100 levels.

All the sectoral indices except Nifty IT and Nifty Pharma indexes were trading in the green. Nifty Metal, up 1.4 percent, rose the highest, while Nifty IT, down 0.3 percent, took the deepest cuts. In the broader market, the S&P BSE MidCap index was up 72 points, or 0.5 percent, to 13,400 levels, while the index zoomed 40 points, or 0.32 percent, to 12,470 levels.

The rupee appreciated by 12 paise to 71.67 against the United States (US) dollar in early trade on Friday following positive developments in the US-China trade talks. Top gainers in the Sensex pack in early trade on Friday included Tata Steel, Vedanta, TCS, Yes Bank (NS: ), ONGC, Tata Motors, HDFC twins, SBI (NS: ), IndusInd Bank (NS: ) and ICICI Bank (NS: ), rising up to 3 percent. On the other hand, TechM, HCL Tech, TCS, Bharti Airtel (NS: ), Infosys (NS: ), and Asian Paints (NS: ) fell up to 1 percent.

Auro pharma weekly technical chart

-- Auro Pharma (599)...Short term target 613 and 622

Stock creates three rising valley pattern on the weekly chart which shows rally will remain unchanged on near support 589 and 581 and a lower price may be at 581 after breaking 589 and staying close to it. Near upper Zigzag is opening on 608 to 615 in the stock which can be considered as near resistance & accidental profitable selling can be seen in the surge of below 608 when the upper target can be found at 615 to 622 after crossing the given resistance 608 with strong volume and closing on it. Short term traders buy at a decline for target rs 613 and 622 with SL 581.

Kotak bank weekly technical chart

-- Sell Kotak Bank (1452)...Short term target 1436 and 1422

Ascending scallop formation is becoming the weekly chart of the stock which indicates for unchanging profitable selling below near resistance 1466 and 1478 and the quick target can be seen at 1478 by crossing resistance 1466 and closing on it. Nearest Donchian chennal breakdown is opening below 1436 and 1422 which can be considered as near support. The low may be at 1422 by breaking 1436 and staying closed below it. Short term traders short sell around resistance for target 1436 and 1422 with strict stop loss 1478.

We are not responsible for any profit or losses made by traders and investors. It is only the outlook of the market with reference to its previous performance. All Judicial you are advised to take your position with your sense and judgment.

description: Shares Analysis by Ashish K Nayak covering: Nifty 50, Asian Paints Ltd., Bharti Airtel Ltd., ICICI Bank Ltd. Read Ashish K Nayak's latest article on Investing.com India.
